items.name: Horses
items.desc: This ode to the beer style that changed everything is brewed with rye and Vienna grains along with Centennial, Chinook, Columbus and Cascade hops for a dry, peppery malt-profile and aromas of grapefruit, pine sap and Seville marmalade.

items.name: Parade
items.desc: Saturated in Citra, Mosaic and Idaho-7, this 6% IPA is brimming with fruit bubblegum flavours of mango, orange peel, pineapple and ripe flat peaches. There are a limited number of cases of this beer and so we don't expect it to hang around for long.

items.name: Pencil
items.desc: This beer is layered with six varieties of roasted, crystal and chocolate malts plus Chinook and Columbus hops for flavours of coffee, molasses, cacao, pine, fresh tobacco, wood burners, damp cobbled Lewesian streets, spumy autumnal river banks and Leonard Cohen's spirit cabinet.

items.name: Queue
items.desc:
Our IndyMan collab is a super citrusy 5% session pale. A pithy, lemony, sherbet-y delight designed for steady supping.
Hops: Azacca, Simcoe, Amarillo
Grains: Marris Otter, Oats, Wheat, Caragold
Yeast: London Fog

items.name: Self-Portrait
items.desc: A light, fluffy, pale ale brewed with London Fog yeast, extra pale malt, wheat and two of our favourite southern hemisphere hops, Vic Secret and Galaxy, for flavours of pineapple, passionfruit and bergamot.

items.name: Trumbo
items.desc: Our first-ever non-nomadically-brewed DIPA is made with Maris Otter and CaraGold malt – delivering a chewy, biscuity mouthfeel – along with Galaxy, Mosaic, Simcoe and Amarillo hops for flavours of lycee, mango and ripe, mushy cherries.
